activities: Ventura Associates International LLC is a marketing and sales promotion agency with a particular expertise in the creation and execution of prize promotions (i.e., games, contests and sweepstakes). As such, we handle PII in order to perform prize drawings and determine winners, and the subsequent fulfillment of prizes, including required tax reporting (if applicable). There is no other use of the PII beyond the winner selection and prize fulfillment requirements of the prize promotion.
eucountries: Belgium, Cyprus, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: The Direct Marketing Association (DMA)'s Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: The Direct Marketing Association (DMA)'s Safe Harbor Program
